channel.title: Need help on removing active quests
channel.description:
can anyone plzz help me i need to know how to remove quests there are 11 quests that are in my server and hen i go to try and weild a draon weapon it tells me i need to complete the quest first also this applies for ancients and lunar.
plzz help me
also how can i add/remove/change the items in a shop i have a glitched dragon platebody and need to switch it
thanks, smerf45

item.title: Need help on removing active quests
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

yes i did restart and compile my server also here is what it currently looks like after i did what you told me to edit

if(wearID == 1052){
//sM(“You must complete Legends Quest to equip this.”);
return true;
}
if(wearID == 4035){
triggerTele(2650, 4565, 1);
}
if(wearID == 4031){
npcId = 1463;
npcId2 = npcId;
isNpc = true;
specGFX(160);
}
if(wearID == 4031){
npcId = 1463;
npcId2 = npcId;
isNpc = true;
specGFX(160);
}
if(wearID == 3753){
//sM(“You must complete Lunar Diplomacy to equip this.”);
return true;
}
if(wearID == 4587){
//sM(“You must complete Monkey Madness to equip this.”);
return true;
}
if(wearID == 1305 || wearID == 5698){
//sM(“You must complete Lost City to equip this.”);
return true;
}
if(wearID == 2740){
//sM(“You must complete all quest to wear this.”);
return true;

Read full topic

also sorry for all my retardedness lol, i just started coding my server

item.title: Need help on removing active quests
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

if(wearID == 1052){ //sM("You must complete Legends Quest to equip this."); return true; } if(wearID == 4035){ triggerTele(2650, 4565, 1); } if(wearID == 4031){ npcId = 1463; npcId2 = npcId; isNpc = true; specGFX(160); } if(wearID == 4031){ npcId = 1463; npcId2 = npcId; isNpc = true; specGFX(160); } if(wearID == 3753){ //sM("You must complete Lunar Diplomacy to equip this."); return true; } if(wearID == 4587){ //sM("You must complete Monkey Madness to equip this."); return true; } if(wearID == 1305 || wearID == 5698){ //sM("You must complete Lost City to equip this."); return true; } if(wearID == 2740){ //sM("You must complete all quest to wear this."); return true; } { __ex.printStackTrace(); } } }

Do me a HUGE favor: read through that, and see what I took out, and figure out why, that way you learn something?

Read full topic

item.source: Need help on removing active quests

item.title: Need help on removing active quests
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

ok well above my welcome message is nothing like what you showed me i also fund this i dont know if that means anything but thats the closest thing ive found so far other than the first thing i found and posted to you. also a tut on this explaining everythig from the beginning would be alot easier

if(wearID == 1052 && q7 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Legends Quest to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4035 && q5 == 3){
triggerTele(2650, 4565, 1);
}
if(wearID == 4031 && q5 == 3){
npcId = 1463;
npcId2 = npcId;
isNpc = true;
specGFX(160);
}
if(wearID == 4031 && q5 == 15){
npcId = 1463;
npcId2 = npcId;
isNpc = true;
specGFX(160);
}
if(wearID == 3753 && q8 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Lunar Diplomacy to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4587 && q5 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Monkey Madness to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1305 && q1 != 15 || wearID == 5698 && q1 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Lost City to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 2740 && q1 != 15 && q2 != 15 && q3 != 15 && q4 != 15 && q5 != 15 && q6 != 15 && q7 != 15 && q8 != 15 && q9 != 15 && q10 != 15 && q11 != 15){
sM(“You must complete all quest to wear this.”);
return false;
}
if(isInCity()==true && wearID != 1351){
sM(“You can’t equip anything but a bronze axe down here!”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 714){
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4151 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}

Read full topic
